resources.string: Terms of Service / Term of Use

Please read this Agreement carefully before accessing or using Camera Block application (collectively referred to as the “Application” or “Camera Block” in these Terms of Service). By accepting, accessing and using any part of the application, you (“you”, “user” or, “end user”) agree to become bound by the terms and conditions of this agreement (collectively, the “Terms of Service” or “Agreement”). If you do not accept or agree to the all terms of this agreement, please do not download, install, access or make any other use of the Application and stop using and uninstall this application.
1. We don’t store or transfer any of your data.

"We physically can’t. We have nowhere to store it. We don’t even have a server database to store it. Application doesn't have permission to use internet, and is not able to communicate with „outside world“ and transfer anything from your device."
All data are saved only in your device, once application is uninstalled, whole “application package” (apk file, database, log files) is thrown away and permanently removed.

The Camera Block is provided “as is” and “as available” without warranty of any kind. Application makes no warranty that content or information will be uninterrupted, timely, error-free and the defects will be corrected, the results that may be obtained from use of this application will be effective, accurate or reliable. Reliance on the availability or accuracy of data, information and application functionality is entirely at the risk of the user, you are solely responsible for any damage to your equipment or device, loss of use, or loss of data.

Camera Block will not be liable to you for any special, indirect, incidental, punitive, reliance, consequential, or exemplary damages relating to your use of the application, even if application has been advised of the possibility of such damages. You agree that the limitations of liability set forth in this section will survive any termination or expiration of this agreement and will apply even if any limited remedy specified herein is found to have failed of its essential purpose. Camera Block in no event shall be liable for damages in connection with the software that may exceed one dollar ($ 1.00). The above limitation shall apply regardless of any essential failure of any resource of the application.

We automatic reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any part of this Agreement. It is your responsibility to check this Agreement periodically for changes here or on the CouplerTracker.com. Your continued use of or access to the Application following the posting of any changes to this Agreement constitutes acceptance of those changes. Automatic may also, in the future, offer new services and/or features through the Application (including, the release of new updates). Such new features and/or services shall be subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

"The user may terminate this Agreement at any time by destroying and/or uninstalling all copies of the Application from their mobile device. The present Agreement will terminate automatically, without prior notice, if the User breaches any term of the present Agreement, in which case the user must immediately destroy and/or uninstall all copies of the application in their possession or control.
This Terms of Service / Term of Use was last modified on September 24th, 2015."
I agree to Terms of Service
applications with camera permission that can ANYTIME use camera on your mobile phone,
of them has internet permission and can upload/transfer pictures or videos from your phone ANYWHERE and ANYTIME.
"Camera block notification in status bar is activated"
"Camera block notification in status bar is deactivated"
Show notification icon in status bar
Choose style of icon in status bar
See apps that have permission to anytime use camera (Take picture, record video..)
List of apps with camera permission (Security threats)
apps may be spying you right now
Free version is not working between 20:00 and 22:00 hour. Support us and Update to PRO version.

"Android applications can't directly interfere to other apps or android system. (One app can not simply disable, block or stop another applications).
- Camera protection can't be technically done without direct access to camera. (On older android versions) (In simple terms: You can't close or block doors if you can't touch or manipulate this doors).
Why app requires internet permission ? - To get application statistics is required internet permission (Google analytics - Number of active installations, number of cracked installations, etc..)."

"Android applications can't directly interfere to other apps or android system. (One app can not simply disable, block or stop another applications).
- Camera protection can't be technically done without direct access to camera (On older android versions). (In simple terms: You can't close or block doors if you can't touch or manipulate this doors).
Why app requires internet permission ? - Free applications are paid from ads, meaning that these app may remain free of charge for you (No internet = no Ads = no Free apps)."
Camera cannot be blocked, other app is using camera ! (Turn off application that is using camera or try restart phone)
Update to PRO version and block / unblock camera just by single click on notification or widget button
" - Protection 24 hours per day (Free version is turned off from 20:00 to 22:00) - Block / unblock camera by single click on widget or notification - No Ads "
Camera will be automatically blocked in
Camera is unblocked for few minutes after click on notification
Block and disable your phone camera by single click. Android applications will not be able to secretly take picture or record you.
"Turn on camera blocking and camera permission will be blocked for all applications! Exceptions can't be technically implemented."
One click on notification and you can start taking pictures and using camera again.
Configure quick launchers that will unblock microphone and launch selected application by single click on notification:
Click to enable first notification launcher
Click to disable first notification launcher
Click to enable second notification launcher
Click to disable second notification launcher
"Application can't be launched, it is probably not standalone (standard) application."
"Please disable 'Lock Screen' / 'Locker' app (Mic Block is not 100% compatible with this kind of apps, it may cause interruptions in blocking)"
